metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13139 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow in psf_memset in common.c in libsndfile 1.0.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted audio file. The vulnerability can be triggered by the executable sndfile-deinterleave.

criterions.comment: libsndfile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
